decl.description:
`furo-ui5-card` is a bindable card that represents information in the form of a tile with separate header and content areas. ```html
Action
content goes here
 ``` ## How To Use Semantic Colors You can use semantic colors to visualize the status or state. Set the attribute design="" with the following values: - Positive (--sapPositiveColor) - Negative (--sapNegativeColor) - Critical (--sapCriticalColor) - Neutral (--sapCriticalColor) * ```html
content goes here
 ```
decl.name: FuroUi5Card

slots.description: defines an action, displayed in the right most part of the header. Note: If status is set, the status text will be displayed, you can either have action, or status.
slots.name: action

slots.description: defines the content of the card
slots.name: content

members.name: bindHeading
members.description: Bind any **scalar** field to set the title of the panel.

members.name: bindIcon
members.description:
Bind any **scalar** field to set the title of the panel.
Do not forget to import the icon you will use in your component.

members.name: bindSubheading
members.description: Bind any **scalar** field to set the subtitle of the panel.

members.name: bindNavNode
members.description:
bind a field with the signature of furo.navigation.Navigationnode

Used fields are:
- display_name
- secondary_text
- icon

members.name: _setNavNodeSignatureValues
members.description: update attributes according to the value of furo.navigation.Navigationnode signature

members.name: icon
members.description:
Defines the visual representation in the header of the card. Supports images and icons.
https://openui5.hana.ondemand.com/test-resources/sap/m/demokit/iconExplorer/webapp/index.html

members.name: heading
members.description: Defines the title displayed in the ui5-card header.

members.name: subheading
members.description: Defines the subheading displayed in the ui5-card header.

members.name: status
members.description:
Defines the status text displayed in the card header (upper right).

By enabling the status, actions are not visible.

members.name: headerInteractive
members.description: Defines if the ui5-card header would be interactive, e.g gets hover effect, gets focused and header-click event is fired, when it is pressed.

members.name: noContentPadding
members.description: Shows the content slot area with no padding

events.description: Fired when the card head is clicked. The header-interactive attribute must be set.
events.name: header-clicked

events.description: Fired when interactive header was clicked.
events.name: header-click

attributes.name: heading
attributes.description: Defines the title displayed in the ui5-card header.

attributes.name: subheading
attributes.description: Defines the subheading displayed in the ui5-card header.

attributes.name: icon
attributes.description:
Defines the visual representation in the header of the card. Supports images and icons.
https://openui5.hana.ondemand.com/test-resources/sap/m/demokit/iconExplorer/webapp/index.html

attributes.name: status
attributes.description:
Defines the status text displayed in the card header (upper right).

By enabling the status, actions are not visible.

attributes.name: header-interactive
attributes.description: Defines if the ui5-card header would be interactive, e.g gets hover effect, gets focused and header-click event is fired, when it is pressed.

attributes.name: no-content-padding
attributes.description: Shows the content slot area with no padding

pkg.name: @furo/ui5
pkg.description: SAP UI5 Web Components data bindings for furo

scripts.docs:generate: npm run analyze:components && npm run analyze:typerenderer && ./scripts/cem.sh
